hero.title:

reimagined.
hero.subtitle: Create Typeform-like experiences with a simple JSON schema. Engineered for performance, designed for conversion.

features.title: Why Sawabona Forms?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build powerful forms.

schema.title: Schema Driven
schema.desc: Define logic, validation, and layout in a single JSON object.

theme.title: Themable Engine
theme.desc: Customize every pixel. Dark mode, fonts, spacings via theme config.

headless.title: Headless Core
headless.desc: Built on Radix UI & Framer Motion for accessible, fluid interactions.

fullscreen.title: Immersive Full-Screen Engagement
fullscreen.desc: A distraction-free experience that users love. By focusing on one question at a time, completion rates skyrocket and data quality improves. It feels less like a form and more like a conversation.

fast.title: Lightning Fast Performance
fast.desc: No bloat. Optimized bundle size (<50kb) ensures your forms load instantly, even on slow connections. Built for the modern web.

types.title: End-to-End Type Safety
types.desc: Built with TypeScript for TypeScript. Your schema, theme, and answers are fully typed, providing a developer experience that just works.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Navigation First
keyboard.desc: Designed for power users. Navigate through questions, select options, and submit without ever touching the mouse. It's fluid, accessible, and fast.

steps.title: Build in minutes, not hours.
steps.subtitle: Skip the boilerplate. Define your schema and let the engine handle the rest.

step1.title: Define Schema
step1.desc: Write a simple JSON object describing your questions and logic.

step2.title: Style & Theme
step2.desc: Match your brand identity with a type-safe theme object.

step3.title: Deploy
step3.desc: Import the component and start collecting responses immediately.

comparison.title: Stop reinventing the wheel.
comparison.subtitle: Building a robust form engine takes months. We did it for you.
